LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: I felt like I was rummaging through nostalgic memories...

LABEL: 0x2CE
STRING: Time passed slowly, and I had fallen into a quiet sleep.

LABEL: 0x306
STRING: I hesitated, wondering when and where I was.

LABEL: 0x34C
STRING: Ah, yes.

LABEL: 0x368
STRING: I remember... This was the bottom of the sea...

LABEL: 0x3F1
STRING: When I opened my eyes, I was in an unfamiliar room.

LABEL: 0x425
STRING: Or, it might be a room I'd seen before.

LABEL: 0x461
STRING: Right, this was the <SHEEP III> submarine.

LABEL: 0x490
STRING: As soon as I sat up, several scenes flashed before my eyes.

LABEL: 0x866
STRING: I remembered―no, how could I forget?

LABEL: 0x8F9
STRING: Every single incident that took place yesterday――

LABEL: 0x92D
STRING: ――Reiri.

LABEL: 0x945
STRING: I moved and pushed my blanket away.

LABEL: 0x97F
STRING: Just as I put my hand on the ladder to get out of bed, I noticed a round window.

LABEL: 0x9CB
STRING: It was a distorted, pressure-resistant glass that was more like a sphere than a circle.

LABEL: 0xA07
STRING: It looked familiar.

LABEL: 0xA23
STRING: I thought back to yesterday when I had boarded the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xAD5
STRING: The view from my assigned room back then was of blue skies and rippling water...

LABEL: 0xB1B
STRING: I was now looking out the window the same way,

LABEL: 0xBAD
STRING: but what greeted me on the other side was pitch-black darkness.

LABEL: 0xBE1
STRING: The time was 08:00.

LABEL: 0xBFA
STRING: I hesitated for a moment in the darkness, but when I thought about it, it was only natural.

LABEL: 0xC9B
STRING: This was the deep sea at a depth of 700 meters.

LABEL: 0xCBF
STRING: There was no way for sunlight to reach here... This world was isolated from the life up on the surface.

LABEL: 0xD07
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0xD7C
STRING: In spite of that, the room was dimly lit, like it was dawn.

LABEL: 0xDD8
STRING: I was pretty sure I turned off the lights in here last night...

LABEL: 0xE12
STRING: My unusually natural awakening must be because of the lighting.

LABEL: 0xE5C
STRING: They really took everything into consideration.

LABEL: 0xE8A
STRING: That's a cutting-edge cruise submarine for you.

LABEL: 0xEB2
STRING: Impressed, I slowly got out of bed, careful not to make a sound.

LABEL: 0xEFC
STRING: Next to me, there was a girl who was sleeping like she was dead.

LABEL: 0xF30
STRING: It was Reiri―the girl we'd found...

LABEL: 0xFAB
STRING: I looked down at her%Nneck, which was peeking out.

LABEL: 0xFCB
STRING: I placed my fingers on it.

LABEL: 0x100D
STRING: It was quiet and slow...

LABEL: 0x102F
STRING: ...But I could definitely feel the warmth of her heartbeat through my fingertips.

LABEL: 0x1077
STRING: ――The culprit might not have been able to kill Reiri, but...

LABEL: 0x10B3
STRING: ...I had killed dozens of people by simply stopping a clock.

LABEL: 0x10E7
STRING: They were someone who had strangled her but weren't able to even kill a single person.

LABEL: 0x1119
STRING: ...This wasn't a matter of comparing the two.

LABEL: 0x1141
STRING: And moreover――

LABEL: 0x1159
STRING: Running from guilt wasn't necessarily pious, ethical, or correct.

LABEL: 0x11B5
STRING: I couldn't forget the many lives I'd taken, which wasn't possible without regret.

LABEL: 0x127C
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x1292
STRING: Even so,

LABEL: 0x12AA
STRING: I had to move forward and not stand still.

LABEL: 0x12DA
STRING: 「Let's go meet up with the others.」

LABEL: 0x1300
STRING: I sprang to my feet and left the crew room, leaving Reiri behind.

LABEL: 0x16AD
STRING: 「Phew, I'm full!」

LABEL: 0x16E4
STRING: 「PONG☆PONG, PANG☆PANG!」

LABEL: 0x1711
STRING: 「Haah...」

LABEL: 0x172B
STRING: While wondering how the food would turn out, I somehow managed to finish breakfast.

LABEL: 0x176D
STRING: I really didn't know what was going to happen... It wasn't an exaggeration.

LABEL: 0x17E7
STRING: I could be accused of sexism or old-fashioned thinking, but...

LABEL: 0x1827
STRING: ...I mean, as human beings, we should all be at least somewhat decent at cooking...

LABEL: 0x18E5
STRING: 「I'm glad it worked out somehow... right?」

LABEL: 0x19A0
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x19C1
STRING: I stood up without answering Hiragino's question.

LABEL: 0x1A0F
STRING: The attention of everyone gathered around the table was focused on me at once.

LABEL: 0x1B11
STRING: 「...There's something I have to tell you.」

LABEL: 0x1B39
STRING: 「I've already told Yukari-san and the others, but...」

LABEL: 0x1B6D
STRING: 「...I'm the one who sank the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x1BFB
STRING: There was no point in hiding it.

LABEL: 0x1C1F
STRING: I bent down deeply and bowed my head.

LABEL: 0x1C4D
STRING: 「I'm sorry I didn't tell you sooner...」

LABEL: 0x1C92
STRING: 「H-Huh, what?」

LABEL: 0x1CB5
STRING: Touri's eyes darted all over the place as she busily turned her head around.

LABEL: 0x1CED
STRING: Seeing her so clearly confused made me feel bad.

LABEL: 0x1D56
STRING: 「Is that true, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x1E00
STRING: 「Yes, well...」

LABEL: 0x1E2B
STRING: 「...But why...?」

LABEL: 0x1E56
STRING: 「I'm sorry for the confusion. Let me explain.」

LABEL: 0x1F05
STRING: And so, I decided to tell them everything that had happened.

LABEL: 0x1F49
STRING: I told them about my sister, who had disappeared seven years ago.

LABEL: 0x1F87
STRING: How I tampered with the route of the ship, making it go toward the area where her accident had occurred.

LABEL: 0x1FC7
STRING: How that was the cause of the collision――

LABEL: 0x20F6
STRING: 「According to Yukari-san, there's a possibility that we hit a layer of methane hydrate.」

LABEL: 0x214A
STRING: 「And that's what caused the explosion.」

LABEL: 0x2185
STRING: 「Um, uhh...」

LABEL: 0x21A7
STRING: 「Methane hydrate...」

LABEL: 0x21CF
STRING: 「――What's that?」

LABEL: 0x2261
STRING: 「I'll explain.」

LABEL: 0x229A
STRING: Yukari raised her index finger.

LABEL: 0x233C
STRING: 「Methane hydrate, like oil and coal,

LABEL: 0x238E
STRING: is a type of fossil fuel that's currently being researched for practical use.」

LABEL: 0x23D0
STRING: 「As for what methane hydrate is in the first place...」

LABEL: 0x2412
STRING: 「It looks like ice, and it's also referred to as "burning ice" because it burns when lit.」

LABEL: 0x24DA
STRING: 「"Burning ice..." I think I've read about it somewhere.」

LABEL: 0x2529
STRING: 「The origin of it is actually "marine snow," or dead plankton that has accumulated on the seafloor.」

LABEL: 0x2587
STRING: 「It's known to exist on the seafloor at a depth of 500 to 1000 meters...」

LABEL: 0x25B8
STRING: 「...And tens to hundreds of meters below the seafloor.」

LABEL: 0x2612
STRING: 「The seafloor...」

LABEL: 0x2643
STRING: 「Yes. As a result of losing control of the ship...」

LABEL: 0x2681
STRING: 「We just happened to enter a layer of methane hydrate.」

LABEL: 0x278D
STRING: 「Stable conditions for methane hydrate are strict. It needs low temperature and high pressure.」

LABEL: 0x27DD
STRING: 「Its state of stability collapsed when the submarine entered the layer...」

LABEL: 0x2867
STRING: 「And――」

LABEL: 0x28A0
STRING: Yukari hesitated and went silent.

LABEL: 0x28CE
STRING: But, no one urged her to continue.

LABEL: 0x2970
STRING: Everyone envisioned and remembered it.

LABEL: 0x2A03
STRING: Collapsing methane hydrate.

LABEL: 0x2A2D
STRING: A shockwave traveling through the water with terrifying force.

LABEL: 0x2A5D
STRING: Pulverized stones smashing against acrylic glass one after another...

LABEL: 0x2B02
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x2BBA
STRING: 「I have no excuse... It's all my fault.」

LABEL: 0x2BF8
STRING: 「Apologizing isn't enough. I know that.」

LABEL: 0x2C3A
STRING: 「I have no intention of asking you to let me atone for what I've done.」

LABEL: 0x2C78
STRING: 「But, I have a responsibility to get everyone back to the surface safely.」

LABEL: 0x2CBA
STRING: 「Otherwise, I'll never be able to forgive myself.」

LABEL: 0x2CFE
STRING: All I did was talk about myself, like this...

LABEL: 0x2D32
STRING: But my words contained no lies.

LABEL: 0x2D5C
STRING: No matter what everyone else thought,

LABEL: 0x2D96
STRING: I had to escape from the bottom of this sea with everyone, for my own sake.

LABEL: 0x2E3E
STRING: 「――I know. Katagiri-san isn't a bad person.」

LABEL: 0x2E81
STRING: 「Touri...」

LABEL: 0x2EAA
STRING: 「Because, you saved Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x2EE8
STRING: 「If you hadn't worked so hard for all our sake,

LABEL: 0x2F1C
STRING: Reiri would be...」

LABEL: 0x2FAD
STRING: 「Thank you so much.」

LABEL: 0x2FD6
STRING: Touri smiled at me.

LABEL: 0x2FF8
STRING: It wasn't as if she didn't understand the gravity of what I'd done.

LABEL: 0x304C
STRING: But, she forgave me, or rather, believed me.

LABEL: 0x309E
STRING: I let out a sigh of relief.

LABEL: 0x314D
STRING: I couldn't read any emotion on Tokiwa's face.

LABEL: 0x3187
STRING: We'd spent half a day together yesterday, but I still couldn't read her feelings at all.

LABEL: 0x31E7
STRING: It was possible she didn't care about any of this, but...

LABEL: 0x32EC
STRING: 「Anyway――」

LABEL: 0x330A
STRING: 「Regardless of the circumstances, everyone's objective is to escape together.」

LABEL: 0x3354
STRING: 「That doesn't mean we can get out right now, however...」

LABEL: 0x33A9
STRING: 「Let's start by sharing information.」

LABEL: 0x33D1
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, there's more you know, isn't there?」

LABEL: 0x341C
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x3432
STRING: She was right.

LABEL: 0x344C
STRING: Now that everyone was unified in their will to escape, there was nothing to hide.

LABEL: 0x3496
STRING: 「I have one piece of good news.」

LABEL: 0x34BA
STRING: 「Communications will be restored at 12:00 today.」

LABEL: 0x34F5
STRING: 「And――」

LABEL: 0x3511
STRING: 「Since we lost contact with them last night,

LABEL: 0x35BA
STRING: the search should have already begun on the surface.」

LABEL: 0x35F7
STRING: As Yukari said, it had been nearly half a day since the <SHEEP III> lost contact with the surface.

LABEL: 0x3644
STRING: This was a matter of life and death for us, and I was sure they knew it as well.

LABEL: 0x372C
STRING: This submarine had sunk to the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x374E
STRING: And, in the middle of the night at that.

LABEL: 0x376C
STRING: Normal deep-sea submarines were generally prohibited from operating at night... That was just how dangerous it was.

LABEL: 0x37C4
STRING: Until now, we hadn't been able to explore the deep sea at night unless it was a stay-type undersea base.

LABEL: 0x381C
STRING: In that regard, the <SHEEP III> was an innovative cruise submarine, but...

LABEL: 0x3867
STRING: The people involved on the surface had no idea what was going on and couldn't even search the area because it was nighttime.

LABEL: 0x3926
STRING: Even they, who started the search at dawn, must be desperate.

LABEL: 0x3962
STRING: ――Even more than us, who could do nothing but wait.

LABEL: 0x3AF3
STRING: 「Sunrise at this time of the year is before 5:00.」

LABEL: 0x3B22
STRING: 「If the search started at the crack of dawn, that means more than three hours have already passed since then.」

LABEL: 0x3BE2
STRING: 「They might even find us before the communications are restored.」

LABEL: 0x3CAA
STRING: 「That's great...!」

LABEL: 0x3CCD
STRING: Touri clapped her hands happily.

LABEL: 0x3CF3
STRING: Hiragino and I couldn't feel that relieved, but there was hope.

LABEL: 0x3D58
STRING: 「What should I do?」

LABEL: 0x3D7E
STRING: 「How can we get the rescue team to come here faster?」

LABEL: 0x3DBF
STRING: Touri couldn't contain her impatience.

LABEL: 0x3DF3
STRING: Hiragino placed his hand on her shoulder.

LABEL: 0x3EAB
STRING: 「First, let's stay calm until we get in touch with them.」

LABEL: 0x3EE3
STRING: 「They say you shouldn't move around on your own when you're lost in the mountains, right?」

LABEL: 0x3F34
STRING: 「What does that have to do with the sea...?」

LABEL: 0x3FD0
STRING: 「In any case, it's still dangerous.」

LABEL: 0x4004
STRING: 「Yes, dangerous...」

LABEL: 0x4029
STRING: Hiragino glanced at Touri and opened his mouth.

LABEL: 0x406A
STRING: 「About yesterday's incident with Reiri-kun...」

LABEL: 0x40CB
STRING: The other incident that everyone was worried about but couldn't bring themselves to talk about.

LABEL: 0x4113
STRING: Reiri had collapsed under the sprinklers.

LABEL: 0x4147
STRING: Hiragino told everyone what he had explained to me last night.

LABEL: 0x417F
STRING: In other words, that there was someone who had knocked Reiri out.

LABEL: 0x41C3
STRING: He did not, however, mention the possibility of a traitor.

LABEL: 0x4205
STRING: ...Well, if the culprit was listening here, they wouldn't be able to touch anyone again.

LABEL: 0x42CF
STRING: 「...And so, here we are.」

LABEL: 0x42F7
STRING: 「I have a favor to ask.」

LABEL: 0x4326
STRING: Hiragino raised his index finger and lifted his head.

LABEL: 0x4377
STRING: 「From now on, don't act or move on your own inside this ship.」

LABEL: 0x448A
STRING: 「Sure thing!」

LABEL: 0x4501
STRING: 「Well, I'm off to see Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x45E3
STRING: 「Wh――Wait!」

LABEL: 0x4644
STRING: Touri... She was a good girl, but when it came to Reiri, she lost sight of everything else.

LABEL: 0x4696
STRING: As soon as she said that, she dashed off by herself.

LABEL: 0x46D0
STRING: Hiragino disappeared as well, chasing after her.

LABEL: 0x4702
STRING: We were left behind by their hustle and bustle.

LABEL: 0x47B9
STRING: 「...Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x4836
STRING: Yukari opened her mouth absentmindedly, and after a moment's pause, cleared her throat.

LABEL: 0x48E6
STRING: 「Let's see...」

LABEL: 0x495D
STRING: 「I'm going back to the wheelhouse as well.」

LABEL: 0x49EE
STRING: 「Please let me know if you need anything.」

LABEL: 0x4A37
STRING: With a somewhat fake-looking smile on her face, Yukari left the lobby.

LABEL: 0x4A6F
STRING: She strode up the stairs at a brisk pace, probably because there was no one to slow her down.

LABEL: 0x4AB7
STRING: And so, the only ones left in the lobby were me and...

LABEL: 0x4AF3
STRING: 「Tokiwa... Are you angry?」

LABEL: 0x4BAA
STRING: She stood there in a daze, looking diagonally upward.

LABEL: 0x4BEA
STRING: Tokiwa's mouth hung open, and she seemed to be thinking about something.

LABEL: 0x4C36
STRING: She'd been like that ever since my confession.

LABEL: 0x4C82
STRING: 「Sorry... I can offer no excuses.」

LABEL: 0x4CBE
STRING: 「It's my fault you got involved in all of this――」

LABEL: 0x4D6A
STRING: 「Dear me.」

LABEL: 0x4D80
STRING: 「You didn't do what you did because you knew it would cause such an accident.」

LABEL: 0x4DCC
STRING: 「How can I accuse you if there's no malice behind your actions?」

LABEL: 0x4E23
STRING: 「Is that... so?」

LABEL: 0x4E41
STRING: Tokiwa spoke attentively, as if she didn't understand my concern.

LABEL: 0x4E81
STRING: She didn't seem to mind at all... In a way, it was just as I imagined.

LABEL: 0x4EC5
STRING: But in that case, what was Tokiwa thinking about?

LABEL: 0x4F0D
STRING: ...Perhaps she wasn't thinking about anything?

LABEL: 0x4FAF
STRING: 「More importantly, there's one thing that's bothering me.」

LABEL: 0x5010
STRING: She began twirling around on the spot while saying that.

LABEL: 0x504A
STRING: With a serious expression on her face and an open mouth, what was she talking about...?

LABEL: 0x509A
STRING: She suddenly stopped spinning in place, and my eyes met hers straight on.

LABEL: 0x514E
STRING: 「Perfect timing, Katagiri-san. Could we cooperate for a bit?」

LABEL: 0x519D
STRING: 「Cooperate...?」

LABEL: 0x51C6
STRING: 「From what I heard of your confession just now, I believe I'm in a good position to blackmail you.」

LABEL: 0x5223
STRING: Tokiwa tilted her head to the side while saying something scary.

LABEL: 0x5261
STRING: Her gesture was more calculating than cute...

LABEL: 0x5291
STRING: ...For some reason, the fact that she maintained a straight face the whole time made it even creepier...

LABEL: 0x533F
STRING: 「My request is very simple.」

LABEL: 0x537F
STRING: 「Namely, diving into the sea.」

LABEL: 0x53E1
STRING: 「Why don't we『let's party』at the bottom of the sea?」

LABEL: 0x5430
STRING: Somehow, this was exactly what I expected.

LABEL: 0x5464
STRING: She was undoubtedly a deep-sea otaku.

LABEL: 0x54A0
STRING: With the prospect of us escaping from here soon,

LABEL: 0x54DC
STRING: what Tokiwa wanted to do before that

LABEL: 0x5512
STRING: was enjoy the deep sea to the fullest...

LABEL: 0x5550
STRING: 「Sorry... I can't do that.」

LABEL: 0x55E4
STRING: 「Seriously,『yo?!』」

LABEL: 0x5603
STRING: Tokiwa's shoulders visibly drooped in shock.

LABEL: 0x5657
STRING: By the way, what was with her English since yesterday?

LABEL: 0x5699
STRING: Did she get infected with some kind of bacteria that lived in this deep sea?

LABEL: 0x56DE
STRING: 「...Even if I told you I was going, you would stop me, wouldn't you?」

LABEL: 0x572D
STRING: 「I don't want Yukari-san to get mad at me.」

LABEL: 0x575D
STRING: I meant it from the bottom of my heart.

LABEL: 0x577D
STRING: That wasn't all, of course.

LABEL: 0x57A5
STRING: I wanted to avoid acting alone, and we shouldn't do anything that would delay our rescue.

LABEL: 0x587B
STRING: 「Then, can't we at least catch jellyfish, shellfish, crabs, or something like that?」

LABEL: 0x58D1
STRING: 「That's okay, right?」

LABEL: 0x58F8
STRING: Tokiwa gradually inched closer to me as she made her suggestion.

LABEL: 0x592C
STRING: She wouldn't give up...

LABEL: 0x5948
STRING: It sounded like a joke,

LABEL: 0x5986
STRING: but I felt indescribable desperation and seriousness in the way she said it and in the tone of her voice.

LABEL: 0x59D4
STRING: 「Are you being serious?」

LABEL: 0x5A76
STRING: 「I'm very serious.」

LABEL: 0x5AA9
STRING: Goddamnit...

LABEL: 0x5AD7
STRING: ...Well then, I guess I don't have a choice.

LABEL: 0x5AFD
STRING: 「Fine... I'll talk to Yukari-san about it.」

LABEL: 0x5B31
STRING: 「If she says you can't, then give up, okay?」

LABEL: 0x5C30
STRING: 「Yes!」

LABEL: 0x5C52
STRING: What a good answer.

LABEL: 0x5C76
STRING: If she were a five-year-old, she would definitely be an honor student.

LABEL: 0x5CA5
STRING: ...How old was she again?

LABEL: 0x5CF8
STRING: 「Now that it's decided, let's head to the wheelhouse!」

LABEL: 0x5D39
STRING: 「H-Hey!」

LABEL: 0x5D53
STRING: Tokiwa started walking peremptorily.

LABEL: 0x5D7F
STRING: Was that a hum or a groan I heard?

LABEL: 0x5DB3
STRING: As Tokiwa stormed off,

LABEL: 0x5E03
STRING: she reflexively grabbed my outstretched hand and continued forward at a blistering pace

LABEL: 0x5E43
STRING: which made me doubt whether she was wearing a kimono or not.

LABEL: 0x5EED
STRING: Like that, the two of us headed for the wheelhouse.
